channel.title: Rafa Benitez on
channel.description: Recent content in Rafa Benitez on

item.title: End game is in sight â€“ do Newcastle United have enough to beat the drop?
item.description: I remember the very day Steve McClaren was appointed Newcastle United manager. There was a strong feeling of disappointment on my part, and indeed the majority of other Newcastle United supporters. It just didn’t make sense from a footballing point of view, but marked a very predictable move by Managing Director, Lee Charnley. Mr. Charnley has been at the club for longer than you might imagine, indeed resident pre-Ashley era. Now, there is little doubt that the man is likely a very committed worker, and a thorough professional.
